typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	ABC as string
}
source(output(
		Test as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Temp
Temp derive(EmailString = $ABC) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		EmailString
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['EmpDataEmailSTR.csv'],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> EmpDataEmailSTRCsv
